content: I find it interesting that this idea has permeated the general discussion with Draymond. I’m actually completely in between. Half the time I love him (his basketball IQ, his fill the ENTIRE stat sheet style) and half the time I hate him (flailing like a mofo, his public display of petulance). I think he’s the most complex player in the NBA and one who elicits a range of feelings from each and every fan.
